Description: Egyptian blue scarab, elytra marked, pierced longitudinally, base inscribed.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: This scarab finds close parallels from the Scarab Factory in Naukratis (on its various productions, see Gorton 1996, 91-131). Gorton, A.F. 1996, Egyptian and Egyptianizing scarabs: a typology of steatite, faience, and paste scarabs from Punic and other Mediterranean sites, Oxford.
